mapper.select: SELECT ROWNUM rnum, jspuser.* FROM jspuser
SELECT * FROM jspuser WHERE userid = #{userId} AND pass = #{pass}
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM runm, a.* FROM (SELECT ROWNUM rnum, jspuser.* FROM jspuser ORDER BY userId) a) WHERE rnum BETWEEN (${page})*(${pageSize})-(${pageSize}-1) AND (${page})*(${pageSize})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO jspuser (userid, name, pass, addr1, addr2, zipcd, birth, email, tel, profile) VALUES (#{userId}, #{name}, #{pass}, #{addr1}, #{addr2}, #{zipcd}, #{birth}, #{email}, #{tel}, #{profile, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
